reporter_caption.center: ELECTION COMMISSION v. LEVANTHAL, 6 Mass. App. Ct. 979 (1978)

caption.center: ELECTION COMMISSION OF NEWTON vs. WILLIAM J. LEVANTHAL.

opinion.opinion_text: The order of the Superior Court is reversed. A judgment is to enter dismissing the action, not on the merits, but on the ground that it has become moot.
